Nova_Base.name: Nova
Nova_Base.text: Deal a percentage of your ability power in a radius around yourself. Nova's damage decreases the further away the target is hit in its radius.

Nova_Slow.name: Frost Nova
Nova_Slow.text: Changes Nova to freeze mobs around in a radius. The mobs will stay frozen for a duration of time, and then get Hypothermia, causing them to be permanently slowed and take damage every 3 seconds.

Nova_Dot.name: Poison Nova
Nova_Dot.text: Changes Nova to instead inflict a percentage of your ability power through poison. The damage will be dealt over a period of time.

Rampage_Base.name: Rampage
Rampage_Base.text: Puts you in a state of rampage, giving you an additional physical damage increase while active.

Rampage_Leech.name: Vampiric
Rampage_Leech.text: Changes rampage to give you life leech instead of increasing your damage while rampaging.

Rampage_Chain.name: Chaining
Rampage_Chain.text: Changes rampage to give your attacks a chaining effect, hitting multiple mobs beyond the first, instead of increasing your damage while rampaging.

Totem_Base.name: Rejuvenation Totem
Totem_Base.text: Creates a totem near you that heals all players in a radius per second.

Totem_Player_Damage.name: Wrath Totem
Totem_Player_Damage.text: Creates a totem near you that increases physical damage of all players in a radius.

Totem_Mana_Regen.name: Spirit Totem
Totem_Mana_Regen.text: Creates a totem near you that regenerates mana of all players in a radius per second.

Totem_Mob_Damage.name: Hatred Totem
Totem_Mob_Damage.text: Creates a totem near you that does a minimal percentage of your ability power to all mobs in a radius on a delay. These hits apply any on-hit effects you may have, with the exception of Lucky Hit.

Empower_Base.name: Empower
Empower_Base.text: Gives you an aura of movement speed. Affecting you and other players within range while active.

Empower_Ice_Armor.name: Ice Armor
Empower_Ice_Armor.text: Encase yourself in a barrier of frost, chilling any mob that hits you for a duration of time while active.

Empower_Slowness_Aura.name: Entropic Bind
Empower_Slowness_Aura.text: Gives you an aura of entropy slowing down mobs in a radius around you while active.

Javelin_Base.name: Javelin
Javelin_Base.text: Summon a magical Javelin to hit your foes from afar. Deals an amount of damage based off your weapon damage and knocks mobs away on impact.

Javelin_Piercing.name: Piercing Javelin
Javelin_Piercing.text: Summon a magical Javelin to hit your foes from afar. Deals an amount of damage based off your weapon damage and pierces an amount of mobs on impact.

Javelin_Scatter.name: Scatter Javelin
Javelin_Scatter.text: Summon a magical Javelin to hit your foes from afar. Deals an amount of damage based off your weapon damage and scatters an amount of javelins on impact bouncing several times.

Javelin_Sight.name: Sight Javelin
Javelin_Sight.text: Summon a magical Javelin to hit your foes from afar. Deals an amount of damage based off your weapon damage and scans the area in a radius on impact, revealing chests and mobs.

Smite_Base.name: Smite
Smite_Base.text: While active, Smite while periodically strike a mob within range dealing a percentage of your ability power, and transferring any on-hit modifiers to the target.

Smite_Archon.name: Archon
Smite_Archon.text: While active, Archon will turn you into a spark. Any mob you physically touch will get bolted for a percentage of your ability power and gives you durability resistance.

Stonefall_Base.name: Stonefall
Stonefall_Base.text: Reduces fall damage when landing while active, knocking back mobs in a radius.

Stonefall_Snow.name: Hero's Landing
Stonefall_Snow.text: Reduces fall damage when landing while active, dealing damage based off ability power to nearby mobs in a radius. The radius is increased with your fall distance.

Stonefall_Cold.name: Coldsnap
Stonefall_Cold.text: Reduces fall damage when landing while active, Chilling and creating glacial prisons mobs in a radius. The radius is affected by fall distance.

Battle_Cry_Base.name: Battle Cry
Battle_Cry_Base.text: Drain the essence of mobs around you, gathering Battle Cry stacks and release an amount of stacks, giving you bonus attack damage on your next direct on-hit attack. The stacks will fizzle after a duration of time if not used.

Battle_Cry_Spectral_Strike.name: Spectral Cry
Battle_Cry_Spectral_Strike.text: Drain the essence of mobs around you, gathering Battle Cry stacks and release an amount of stacks, adding ability power as damage, on your next direct on-hit attack. The stacks will fizzle after a duration of time if not used.

Battle_Cry_Lucky_Strike.name: Lucky Cry
Battle_Cry_Lucky_Strike.text: Drain the essence of mobs around you, gathering Battle Cry stacks and release an amount of stacks, giving you bonus Lucky Hit chance on your next direct on-hit attack. The stacks will fizzle after a duration of time if not used.

Storm_Arrow_Base.name: Storm Arrow
Storm_Arrow_Base.text: Shoot an arrow that creates a storm above upon impact. Deals an amount of damage based off your ability power. The storm cloud stays for a duration of time and will strike every so often.

Storm_Arrow_Blizzard.name: Blizzard Arrow
Storm_Arrow_Blizzard.text: Shoot an arrow that creates an ice storm above upon impact. Each ice shard will freeze mobs on hit for a duration. Also has a chance to frostbite the mob for a duration of time every so often.

Fireball_Base.name: Fireball
Fireball_Base.text: Summon a magical Fireball to hit your foes afar. Deals an amount of damage based off your ability power.

Fireball_Volley.name: Fire Volley
Fireball_Volley.text: Summon a magical bouncing Fireball that scorches mobs in its path and deals an amount of damage based off your ability power. After a duration of time, it explodes in a radius dealing its full damage.

Fireball_Fireshot.name: Fireshot
Fireball_Fireshot.text: Summons a small magical fireshot to hit mobs from afar. Deals an amount of damage based of your ability power, and transfers any on-hit effects from you.

Vein_Miner_Base.name: Vein Miner
Vein_Miner_Base.text: Allows you to mine multiple blocks at once!

Vein_Miner_Durability.name: Finesse Miner
Vein_Miner_Durability.text: Changes Vein Miner to gain a chance of ignoring taking durability damage while using it to mine blocks. However, the amount of blocks mined is lowered.

Vein_Miner_Void.name: Void Miner
Vein_Miner_Void.text: Changes Vein Miner to void any blocks it mines inside a vault with the exception of vault ores. However the amount of blocks mined is lowered.

Ghost_Walk_Base.name: Ghost Walk
Ghost_Walk_Base.text: Makes you invisible for a duration of time. Attacking anything during the Ghost Walk will cancel its effect.

Ghost_Walk_Spirit.name: Spirit Walk
Ghost_Walk_Spirit.text: Makes you invisible for a duration of time. Attacking anything, breaking a block, or opening a container during the Spirit Walk will cancel its effect.

Dash_Base.name: Dash
Dash_Base.text: Propels you a distance in the direction you are facing!

Dash_Damage.name: Bullet
Dash_Damage.text: Turns your dashes into bullets, making you deal a percentage of your physical damage to any mob you hit with you dash.

Dash_Warp.name: Warp
Dash_Warp.text: Shoot a magic arrow that teleports you to its location on impact. If you hit a mob or another player you swap places with them.

Mega_Jump_Base.name: Mega Jump
Mega_Jump_Base.text: Gives you the ability to mega jump up in the air.

Mega_Jump_Break_Down.name: Mega Dig
Mega_Jump_Break_Down.text: Changes Mega Jump to a Mega Dig! Instead of launching you up in the air it drills you downwards in to blocks, breaking them on the way.

Shell_Base.name: Shell
Shell_Base.text: While active, Shell will give you hardened skin, giving you a chance to stun mobs when getting hit.

Shell_Porcupine.name: Porcupine
Shell_Porcupine.text: While active, Porcupine will increase your thorns damage and give you durability resistance.

Shell_Quill.name: Quill
Shell_Quill.text: While active, Porcupine will increase your thorns damage and chain your thorns to hit additional targets. In addition, Quill also gives you a durability resistance while active.

Heal_Base.name: Heal
Heal_Base.text: Heals you for an amount of hitpoints.

Heal_Group.name: Group Heal
Heal_Group.text: Changes your Heal to a group heal! Healing yourself and teammates around you for an amount of hitpoints.

Heal_Cleanse.name: Cleanse
Heal_Cleanse.text: Changes your Heal to instead Cleanse any negative effect affecting you.

Hunter_Base.name: Hunter
Hunter_Base.text: Highlights wooden chests inside the vault in a radius for a duration of time.

Hunter_Blocks.name: Hunter: Observer
Hunter_Blocks.text: Changes Hunter to instead display objectives within a radius for a duration of time.

Hunter_Gilded.name: Hunter: Gilded
Hunter_Gilded.text: Changes Hunter to instead display Gilded chests within a radius for a duration of time.

Hunter_Living.name: Hunter: Living
Hunter_Living.text: Changes Hunter to instead Living chests within a radius for a duration of time.

Hunter_Ornate.name: Hunter: Ornate
Hunter_Ornate.text: Changes Hunter to instead display Ornate chests within a radius for a duration of time.

Hunter_Coins.name: Hunter: Coins
Hunter_Coins.text: Changes Hunter to instead display Coin Piles within a radius for a duration of time.

Taunt_Base.name: Taunt
Taunt_Base.text: Taunts mobs around you in a radius, angering them towards you, and making them vulnerable for a duration of time. Each level of Vulnerability increases damage taken by that mob by 10%.

Taunt_Repel.name: Fear
Taunt_Repel.text: Instead of taunting mobs around you, they are now feared by you in a radius. A feared mob will get pushed away and refuse to attack you for a duration of time.

Taunt_Charm.name: Charm
Taunt_Charm.text: Charms a number of mobs within a radius around you to fight for you. Charmed mobs deal a pecentage of your ability power as damage to their targets and can trigger on-hit effects.

Mana_Shield_Base.name: Mana Shield
Mana_Shield_Base.text: Gives you a shield that redirects a percentage of incoming damage to your mana pool.

Mana_Shield_Retribution.name: Retribution
Mana_Shield_Retribution.text: Gives you a mana shield that redirects a percentage of incoming damage to your mana pool. After absorbing damage, your next attack's damage will be added to a percentage of the absorbed damage and dealt to all mobs in a radius around your target.

Mana_Shield_Implode.name: Implode
Mana_Shield_Implode.text: Drains all of your mana dealing damage equal to a percentage of the mana drained to all enemies in a radius.

Farmer_Base.name: Farmer
Farmer_Base.text:
Increases growth speed on crops in a radius using a delay. Farmer targets:
  • Seeds
  • Potatoes
  • Carrots
  • Beet Root
  • Flax Seeds

Farmer_Melon.name: Farmer: Cultivator
Farmer_Melon.text:
Increases growth speed on crops in a radius using a delay. Cultivator targets all base ability targets, plus:
  • Melon
  • Pumpkins

Farmer_Cactus.name: Farmer: Gardener
Farmer_Cactus.text:
Increases growth speed on coprs in a radius using a delay. Gardener targets all base ability targets, plus:
  • Cactus
  • Sugar Cane
  • Nether Wart

Farmer_Animal.name: Farmer: Rancher
Farmer_Animal.text:
Changes Farmer to also incentivise baby animals to become big bois! It does so with a delay in a radius around you. Rancher targets all base ability targets, plus:
  • Baby Animals
  • Baby Villagers

Summon_Eternal_Base.name: Summon Eternal
Summon_Eternal_Base.text: Summons your eternals! This ability requires you to have at least one eternal alive on an Eternal Pedestal, or it will do nothing.
